item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Raymond E. Feist
item.description: "Life is problems. Living is solving problems." -- Raymond E. Feist

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Mario Puzo
item.description: "A friend should always underestimate your virtues and an enemy overestimate your faults" -- Mario Puzo

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "I no longer drink nearly as much as I used to but, still, my motto is Sine coffea nihil sum. Without coffee, I'm nothing." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Anthony Trollope
item.description: "What on earth could be more luxurious than a sofa, a book, and a cup of coffee?...Was ever anything so civil?" -- Anthony Trollope

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Mario Puzo
item.description: "Never get angry. Never make a threat. Reason with people." -- Mario Puzo

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "The price of greatness is responsibility." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "The era of procrastination, of half-measures, of soothing and baffling expedients, of delays is coming to its close. In its place we are entering a period of consequences." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Quotation is a serviceable substitute for wit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Mario Puzo
item.description: "Many young men started down a false path to their true destiny. Time and fortune usually set them aright." -- Mario Puzo

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History is written by the victors." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by mario puzo
item.description: "it's just business nothing personal..." -- mario puzo

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "A politician needs the ability to foretell what is going to happen tomorrow, next week, next month, and next year. And to have the ability afterwards to explain why it didn't happen." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have nothing to declare except my genius." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The world is a stage and the play is badly cast." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Mario Puzo
item.description: "Every man has but one destiny" Veto Corleone" -- Mario Puzo

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Wise? No, I simply learned to think." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am too fond of reading books to care to write them." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Winston Churchhill
item.description: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchhill

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Books should go where they will be most appreciated, and not sit unread, gathering dust on a forgotten shelf, don't you agree?" -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Work is the curse of the drinking classes." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "No man needs sympathy because he has to work, because he has a burden to carry. Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The suspense is terrible. I hope it will last." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ambarishh add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Out of the huts of history's shame I rise Up from a past that's rooted in pain I rise I'm a black ocean, leaping and wide, Welling and swelling I bear in the tide. Leaving behind nights of terror and fear I rise Into a daybreak that's wondrously clear I rise Bringing the gifts that my ancestors gave, I am the dream and the hope of the slave. I rise I rise I rise." -- Maya Angelou
